results.title: Metformin Attenuates the Metabolic Disturbance and Depression-like Behaviors Induced by Corticosterone and Mediates the Glucose Metabolism Pathway.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Attenuates the Metabolic @<m>DISEASE_Voice_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014832 @@@Disturbance@@@ and @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@Depression@@@-like Behaviors Induced by @CHEMICAL_Corticosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003345 @@@Corticosterone@@@ and Mediates the @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@Glucose@@@ Metabolism Pathway.

results.title: Metformin modulates microbiota-derived inosine and ameliorates methamphetamine-induced anxiety and depression-like withdrawal symptoms in mice.
results.text_hl: Second, both @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@-to-@SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ and @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@-to-@SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ FMTs confirmed that @CHEMICAL_Methamphetamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008694 @@@METH@@@-altered-microbiota transplantation is sufficient to promote @DISEASE_Anxiety @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@ and @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@-like behaviours in recipient germ-free @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, and these @<m>DISEASE_Voice_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014832 @@@behavioural disturbances@@@ could be ameliorated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Yang J, Zhang Z, Xie Z, Bai L, Xiong P, Chen F, Zhu T, Peng Q, Wu H, Zhou Y, Ma Y, Zhang Y, Chen M, Gao J, Tian W, Shi K, Du Y, Duan Y, Wang H, Xu Y, Kuang YQ, Zhu M, Yu J, Wang K. Metformin modulates microbiota-derived inosine and ameliorates methamphetamine-induced anxiety and depression-like withdrawal symptoms in mice. Biomed Pharmacother. 2022 May;149():112837. PMID: 35339829

results.title: The Role of Metformin in Metabolic Disturbances during Pregnancy: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome and Gestational Diabetes Mellitus
results.text_hl: The Role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ in Metabolic @<m>DISEASE_Voice_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014832 @@@Disturbances@@@ during Pregnancy: @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@Polycystic Ovary Syndrome@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@Gestational Diabetes Mellitus@@@

results.title: [Outcomes in women with history of gestational diabetes mellitus. Screening and prevention of type 2 diabetes mellitus. Literature review].
results.text_hl: Among @DISEASE_Overweight @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@ or @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with history of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@GDM@@@ who show minor @<m>DISEASE_Voice_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014832 @@@glycoregulation disturbances@@@, it is proved that modifications of lifestyle in intensive programs or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ halve the risk of DT2.

citations.NLM: Vérier-Mine O. [Outcomes in women with history of gestational diabetes mellitus. Screening and prevention of type 2 diabetes mellitus. Literature review]. J Gynecol Obstet Biol Reprod (Paris). 2010 Dec;39(8 Suppl 2):S299-321. PMID: 21185481
